name: A Part (Samantha Hallam)
description:
A Part is a Ghibli-inspired roguelike game created for the Chillennium 2023 game jam! Follow the paladin and cleric as they battle swarms of Yokai. Last as long as you can and compete against yourself.

Controls (supports both controllers and keyboard):

Movement: WASD or Left Joystick

Attack: E or X Button

Swap Chracters: Q or Y Button

External Assets Used: HDRI used for Skysphere

Softwares Used: Maya, Photoshop, Substance Painter, Unity, MuseScore, Audacity

Team Credits:

Jocylin Lopez: 3D and 2D assets

Brack Harmon: UI assets, 2D assets and UI/UX programming

Sam Hallam: SFX, music, and gameplay programming
